content: Tom Deakin - University of Bristol View Scopus Profile Dr Tom Deakin PhD, MSci, PGDip Senior Lecturer in Advanced Computer Systems, School of Computer Science https://orcid.org/0000-0002-6439-4171 Emailtom.deakinbristol.acuk BS8 1UB Personal profile Research interestsI'm interested in understanding and achieving the performance limiting factors of massively parallel High Performance simulation codes. This means conducting performance analysis on parallel codes to understand what performance is possible on existing and future many-core processors. I then use this model to understand how performance portable the implemenations are across different processors and programming languages.
